## Overview

In this guide, you'll learn how to deploy a [Stellar Asset Contract (SAC)](../../../tokens/stellar-asset-contract.mdx) for a Stellar asset using the Stellar SDK. The Stellar SDK is a set of tools and library designed to help developers build applications that interact with the Stellar blockchain network.
